ygData.subject: Excessive quoting
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey folks -- trim your quotes!!!  Suzanne and Dawn have been posting two-line messages followed by the entire contents of a digest.  This makes it almost
ygData.messageBody:
Hey folks -- trim your quotes!!! Suzanne and Dawn have been posting
two-line messages followed by the entire contents of a digest. This makes
it almost impossible to read any messages following them in the digest,
since they are lost in the spam. It also makes the download time
excessive. This is at the least an inconvenience, and some people pay for
their download time, so it's an extra expense. Try to follow basic
netiquette and don't quote anything that you aren't specifically intending
to have people re-read.

- Beth "BethMo" Moursund
player of Windsong, Anna, Staar of Solusek Ro
